title: Australia rolls out AI roadmap, steps back from tougher rules
description: Australia on Tuesday unveiled a roadmap to ramp up the adoption of artificial intelligence across its economy but said it would rely on existing laws to manage emerging risks, stepping back from earlier plans for tougher rules on high-risk scenarios.
content: SYDNEY, Dec 2 (Reuters) - Australia on Tuesday unveiled a roadmap to ramp up the adoption of artificial intelligence across its economy but said it would rely on existing laws to manage emerging risks, stepping back from earlier plans for tougher rul... [1916 chars]

title: UChicago AI tool seeks to help renters better understand their rights
description: A group of law students at the University of Chicago is using artificial intelligence to make legal help more accessible to the general public.
content:
A group of law students at the University of Chicago is using artificial intelligence to make legal help more accessible to the general public.

title: AI turbocharges chip design: Cadence, Samsung, Tessolve units see India at heart of next
description: Artificial intelligence (AI) is rapidly reshaping how complex chips are conceived, verified and brought to market, with global players such as Cadence Design Systems, Samsung Semiconductor’s Indian R&D arm and Tessolve (all three headquartered in San Jose, California), betting on AI-driven flows. Executives from Cadence, Samsung Semiconductor India Research (SSIR), and Tessolve, told ET, AI is becoming a core enabler across their semiconductor stack.

title: Apple artificial intelligence head to leave after AI struggles
description: Apple Inc. artificial intelligence head John Giannandrea plans to step down from the job, ending a challenging stint at the iPhone maker.
content:
(Bloomberg/Nick Turner) — Apple Inc. artificial intelligence head John Giannandrea plans to step down from the job, ending a challenging stint at the iPhone maker.

title: Who is Amar Subramanya? Apple taps ex- Microsoft & Google AI executive to replace retiring chief John Giannandrea
description: Apple has appointed former Microsoft and Google executive Amar Subramanya as its new AI chief, succeeding John Giannandrea. The leadership shake-up comes as Apple races to catch rivals in artificial intelligence and prepares a revamped Siri for 2026.
